entry.title: [GLOBAL][Databases] - MongoDB migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 17, 11:54 UTC  -  Jul 28, 11:54 UTC

May 23, 07:12 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/07/2023 11:54 UTC
End time : 28/07/2023 11:54 UTC
Service impact : A small downtime may be experienced for less than 15 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will be doing a migration for our MongoDB nodes.

entry.title: [GRA7][Public Cloud] - Customers migration Kubernetes to 1.22
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 26, 06:00 UTC  -  Jun 27, 17:00 UTC

Jun 8, 21:54 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/06/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 27/06/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version
Service improvement :As Kubernetes 1.21 comes to the end of its life, we will be migrating to the new version 1.22.

entry.title: [GRA][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Private Registry migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 22, 16:00 - 20:00 UTC

Jun 16, 00:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/06/2023 16:00 UTC
End time : 22/06/2023 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Registries in plan M/L in GRA region are the only one impacted.
Customers won't be able to push new image during a part of the maintenance period. Existing images remain available.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate clients that are at the M and L plan level to a different infrastructure.

entry.title: [GRA5/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.21
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 22, 06:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jun 8, 14:24 UTC
Update - Due to the large number of clusters to migrate to GRA7, we prefer to exclude GRA7 from this migration session.
GRA7 clusters to be migrated next week.

Jun 6, 10:39 UTC
Update - An email has been sent to customers identified. It states that this maintenance is scheduled for 22/06/2023.
we updated this task schedule.

May 17, 02:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/07/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 06/07/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.22).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.22).
